trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Bay Shore
There were no other sightings in Bay Shore on or around January 29th 2010
divs: Sighting Detailsmy friend and i were driving on robert moses causeway back from the beaches and we saw an airplane fly over head. we watched it fly into the distance and then it kind of just stopped in mid air hovering there or somrthing. then we looiked east and there was another..then north and another. they all flew in a triagular shape with eachother. they did not dissapear for well over ten minutes.
